Introduction

Qian Kun is a Chinese singer under SM Entertainment. He is best known for being a member of NCT and it's sub-units NCT U and WayV. He is also part of the duo WayV-KUN&XIAOJUN, a subgroup specific to WayV.

In 2015, he was selected for SM Entertainment through the Beijing-based SM Global Audition. He was first announced as a part of the SMROOKIES pre-debut training group on December 18, 2015.

In 2016 Kun debuted as a member of NCT's first unit NCT U through the Chinese version of the single 'Without You'.
